TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SrgsItem extends System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement

summary.span: 表示包含片語或其他實體，使用者可以使用來產生成功辨識的文法項目。

span.span: Represents a grammar element that contains phrases or other entities that a user can speak to produce a successful recognition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件可以組成片語，實體這類物件、 片語的邏輯組合和物件，並依此類推。An object can consist of phrases, entities such as objects, logical combinations of phrases and objects, and so on. 您可以使用上的屬性類別來存取構成物件。You can use the property on the class to gain access to the constituents of an object. 順序物件會出現在指定物件會指定使用者必須讀出它們的順序。The order in which objects appear in a given object specifies the order in which a user must speak them. 根據預設，內容必須正好一次讀出。By default, the contents of an must be spoken exactly once. 若要指定的內容必須是重複說出使用建構函式和集合`repeatCount`參數。To specify that the contents of an must be spoken repeatedly, use the constructor and set the `repeatCount` parameter. 同樣地，若要指定數目的範圍的次數可以說出、 建立其中一個設定的建構函式屬性和屬性。Similarly, to specify a range for the number of times that an can be spoken, create the with one of the constructors that set the property and the property. 如果已經存在，您可以使用其中一種或方法，以指定重複項目。If the already exists, you can use one of the or the methods to specify repeats. 您也可以指定的項目將會重複說出所設定的值的機率屬性。You can also specify the probability that an item will be repeatedly spoken by setting the value of the property. 物件內物件組成的使用者可以唸出其中的替代項目清單。 objects within an object comprise a list of alternatives from which the user can speak one. 您可以使用屬性來指定需要講出指定的項目清單中的可能性。You can use the property to specify the likelihood that a given item in the list will be spoken. 類別代表`item`World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 中所定義的項目[語音辨識文法規格 (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)。The class represents the `item` element that is defined in the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761). 如需 SRGS`item`項目和 System.Speech，其支援的詳細資料請參閱[item 項目](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/10cba7dd-994e-4aa7-907e-0669e5467d60)。For information about the SRGS `item` element and details about its support by System.Speech, see [item Element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/10cba7dd-994e-4aa7-907e-0669e5467d60).

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 針對這個多載的 constructer預設值將物件初始化`repeatCount`屬性為 0。This overloaded constructer for initializes the object with a default `repeatCount` property of 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要設定這個屬性，使用方法。To set this property, use the method. 這個屬性表示的一部分`repeat`World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 所定義的屬性[語音辨識文法規格 (SRGS) Version 1.0](https://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/)。This property represents a portion of the `repeat` attribute defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](https://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).

summary.span: 取得或設定使用者會重複此 執行個體之內容的可能性。

span.span: Gets or sets the probability that a user will repeat the contents of this instance.

value.span: 這個項目的內容會重複說出的機率，以浮點數值表示。

span.span: The probability, as a floating point value, that the contents of this item will be repeatedly spoken.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性僅適用於項目其並屬性已明確設定為非預設值，藉由建構函式或是方法。The property applies only to items whose and properties have been explicitly set to non-default values, either by a constructor for or by the method.

exception.span: 嘗試要將設定為負數或大於 1.0 的值。

span.span: An attempt is made to set to a value that is negative or larger than 1.0.
Sets the repetition count for an item.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float Weight { float get(); void set(float value); };
member this.Weight : single with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定調整說話時說到 物件中 之可能性的乘數。

span.span: Gets or sets a multiplying factor that adjusts the likelihood that an in a object will be spoken.

value.span: 浮點值，會調整這個項目被說出的可能性。

span.span: A floating point value that adjusts the likelihood of this item being spoken.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的預設值為 1.0，這相當於沒有加權的項目。The default value of this property is 1.0, which is equivalent to no weighting of the item. 大於 1.0 權數正面 biases 的可能性會說出的項目，且小於 1.0 的權數負面 biases 項目會讀出的可能性。A weight greater than 1.0 positively biases the likelihood that the item will be spoken, and a weight less than 1.0 negatively biases the likelihood that the item will be spoken. 這個屬性是只與相關物件內執行個體，則會忽略其他所有情況。This property is relevant only to objects within an instance; it is ignored in all other cases.

span.span: An attempt is made to set to a negative value.
